```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
embeddings <- read_csv("../data/embeddings.csv", header = FALSE)
```

```{r}
embeddings |>
  pivot_longer(names_to = "feature") |>
  mutate(
    taxon = rep(1:144, each = 50),
    time = rep(1:50, 144)
  )
```
